title: Avenge the Hag Survivors
content:
into her lair, we stand face to face. In order to prevent Ethel from resurrecting, we must burn her pearlspore bells using fire. This hag's power has grown. So has ours. Time to show her that.

Tell the survivors the good news.

We defeated Auntie Ethel. We ought to give her victims the good news - this time of fear and doubt is at an end.

Avenge the Hag Survivors Walkthrough

Heavily coincides with Save Vanra. Do these in tandem. After completing the quest Help the Hag Survivors, retrieive th
